name: Beagles IO (Opoly)
description:
BEAGLES IO (Opoly)

Beagles IO is a fun, super-fast, canine property trading game that celebrates all Beagles. Play against your friend, friends, or AI (Artificial Intelligence). Spin, buy, and sell as you race around the Beagles IO board. Every time you buy the same color board spaces you achieve Beagles IO. The richest player wins the game!

Optional Game Features
* Change names
* Leader boards
